oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Perspective of organic livestock production of bovine veterinarians in the United States
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sorge, U. S.
Yamashita, S.
Pieper, L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: organic
dairy cattle
dairy production
The National Organic Program of the United States
therapies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Over the past decade the organic agricultural industry has grown exponentially; dairy production represents its second largest sector. The National Organic Program of the United States limits the list of allowable therapies, therefore the objective of this study was to ask bovine veterinarians regarding their opinion, perception, and challenges while working with organic livestock herds.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2015; 266
